name: basictable
description: Basic Table Vanilla JS library for Preline UI-compliant responsive tables with modern card-style mobile design.

scripts.compile-js: terser src/js/basictable.js --output dist/js/basictable.min.js -c -m --comments && terser src/js/basictable.js --output dist/js/basictable.js -b indent_level=2
scripts.compile-css: uglifycss src/css/basictable.css > dist/css/basictable.min.css --ugly-comments && beautify-css src/css/basictable.css dist/css/basictable.css

author: jerrylow
